text: Vladimír Oplt (1937 – 5 January 2021) was a Czech politician. He was a member of the Czech Senate from 1996 to 2001. He was a member of the Civic Democratic Party. Oplt was born in Kladno, Czech Republic. Oplt died on 5 January 2021 in Prague, aged 83. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Czech politicians
title: Vladimír Oplt
